name: Dustin'
overview: Dustin is a tiny robot who has been tasked with cleaning the dust from the innards of the world's best 8-bit computer! Guide him around and help him clean up the dust particles - but watch out for electrical pulses that move across the circuit, they will fry him! Dustin' makes me feel good... Created for the Reset Magazine's 2018 C64 4KB Game Coding Competition
